-- | A simple wrapper to send emails via the api of the service postmark (http://postmarkapp.com/)

--   A simple wrapper to send emails via the api of the service postmark

@package email-postmark
@version 0.2

module Network.Mail.Postmark
postmark :: ToJSON a => String -> a -> a -> a -> a -> a -> IO Bool
